publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3361 Tommy Sheridan: Scottish Gulf War Veterans-That the Parliament recognises the deep concern over the health conditions of Scottish Gulf War veterans and calls on the Scottish Executive to recognise their illness and to ensure that they receive the appropriate treatment. Supported by: Mr John McAllion*, Dennis Canavan*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*, John Farquhar Munro*, Elaine Smith*, Ms Sandra White*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Tavish Scott*, Ms Margo MacDonald*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Alex Neil*
